Class TriangleShape

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Polygon
TriangleShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, ModifiableShape
public class TriangleShape
extends java.awt.Polygon
implements ModifiableShape
Represents an isosceles right triangle.
See Also:
Serialized Form
